body_html: Moving it to contrib will definitely make the api compatibility test pass. I would almost suggest we put it in tf.manip.roll to start the new namespace where we put things like slice, concat, stack, unstack. What do you think @drpngx?
body_text: Moving it to contrib will definitely make the api compatibility test pass. I would almost suggest we put it in tf.manip.roll to start the new namespace where we put things like slice, concat, stack, unstack. What do you think @drpngx?
body: Moving it to contrib will definitely make the api compatibility test pass. I would almost suggest we put it in `tf.manip.roll` to start the new namespace where we put things like slice, concat, stack, unstack. What do you think @drpngx?
